item.title: IPC & Post-Quantum Will Fuse Blockchain & Cloud Technologies
item.description:
IPC & Post-Quantum Will Fuse Blockchain & Cloud Technologies

New Jersey-based IPC Systems has partnered with Post-Quantum Solutions to implement biometrics, encryption and blockchain technologies into its Connexus Cloud network. Also read: Private Internet Access VPN Adds Roger Ver to Advisory Board IPC currently specializes in trading turret products and multi-speaker communications devices.

item.title: Bitcoin 0.13.0 May Change Bitcoin Forever
item.description:
Bitcoin 0.13.0 May Change Bitcoin Forever

Remember Windows Vista? The new Coke? An upgrade is not always a good thing until it is a good thing. Yet, without making changes and testing, things will never improve. Bitcoin Core is also going to be upgraded and hopefully things will be better for the cryptocurrency after it comes out.

item.title: Shopawl Introduces Option To Buy eBay Goods With Bitcoin
item.description:
Shopawl Introduces Option To Buy eBay Goods With Bitcoin

Not too long ago, we mentioned the ShopAwl service, which lets Bitcoin users shop around on the web. The company has expanded their offering, and will now accept eBay purchases as well. By using the service, any bitcoin user can buy goods from eBay in exchange for Bitcoin.

item.title: Blockchain Startup Symbiont Adds Ex-Morgan Stanley Director - CoinDesk
item.description:
Blockchain Startup Symbiont Adds Ex-Morgan Stanley Director - CoinDesk

Former Morgan Stanley managing director Caitlin Long has joined blockchain startup Symbiont as president and chairman of the board. The New York-based blockchain firm, which is seeking to advance capital markets blockchain applications in syndicated loans and OTC derivatives, announced the hiring today.

item.title: Dash Across America: John Bush Jackalope Speech on Freedom Cells and Self Improvement
item.description:
Dash Across America: John Bush Jackalope Speech on Freedom Cells and Self Improvement

In this Dash Across America update, we hear a speech John Bush gave at Jackalope Freedom Festival on Freedom Cells and Self Improvement. Freedom Cells are peer to peer mutual aid groups where members work together to secure their sovereignty. John spends the latter part of the speech talking about the role self improvement plays in creating better world.

item.title: Darknet Avengers Forum Reopens Its Doors To The Public
item.description:
Darknet Avengers Forum Reopens Its Doors To The Public

Darknet marketplaces come in many different sizes and shapes. Avengers Forum is one of the more unique platforms, as it is a service to promote harm reduction. The group primarily focuses on drug trading. However, the marketplace went dark a few months ago, and most assumed it would remain offline.

item.description:
Ethereum Classic Price Technical Analysis - Test of 0.0020BTC Likely - NEWSBTC

item.title: Bitmain releases new bitcoin miner, meticulously designed for homes - EconoTimes
item.description:
Bitmain releases new bitcoin miner, meticulously designed for homes - EconoTimes

Bitmain releases new bitcoin miner, meticulously designed for homes Monday, August 29, 2016 6:26 AM UTC Bitmain which is one of the market leaders in the bitcoin mining hardware manufacturer space, unveiled that it will begin the sale of Antminer R4 today at 23:00 (GMT+8).
